QuestData.Title: Placing the Pawns
QuestData.Description: <You hear a buzzing in your ear.>$b$b$n. It sounds like you and Ariok have finished with your tasks. I've also finished mine.$b$bReturn to Flame Crest. I've prepared a few packages to deliver to the Big Three: Thorg'izog, Neeralak, and Xi'lun. You've already met General Thorg'izog. This will be your chance to meet the other two.$b$bThat is, before you kill them.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Return to Flame Crest. I have a few packages for you to deliver.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Eitrigg at Flame Crest in Burning Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, you're back.$b$bI hope you've still got that disguise. You're going back undercover, $n.
